title: S Master Tokens
body: I have gotten an S- twice on xin Zhao and no mastery tokens?

replies.body: I've been Mastery Level 7 on Xin since the week Mastery tokens came out. Just buy {{item:2049}} for a couple of games and ward like crazy. That's what I did. The system basically ends up thinking you're a roaming support and giving you an S+ automatically because you're like the only Xin Zhao support in the game.

Looks like you're Mastery Level 6 with him right now. Remember that you can only get Level 7 tokens from S's or S+'s. 

https://i.gyazo.com/fd3960c214743d847d5c094dc50f937b.png
